controls.label: Company Card
controls.customCode:

{{truncateText(rowData.$pitch.aboutTheCompany, 200)}}

controls.name: control_custom_974881
controls.label: Company Representative
controls.customCode:
{{rowData.$sME.name}} {{rowData.$sME.secondName}}
{{rowData.$sME.phoneNumber}}
{{e}}

controls.name: control_custom_469726
controls.label: Mentor Card
controls.customCode:
{{rowData.$mentor.name}} {{rowData.$mentor.secondName}}

{{truncateText(rowData.$mentor.aboutMe, 100)}}

{{rowData.$mentor.phoneNumber}}
{{e}}

controls.name: control_number_797480
controls.label: Duration
controls.description: Please enter the duration in hours (30 minutes = 0.5, 1 hour = 1)

controls.name: control_multiline_text_325453
controls.label: Session Review for SME
controls.description: Please leave a review for your session with the SME

controls.name: control_multiline_text_17457
controls.label: Session Review for Mentor
controls.description: Please leave a review for your session with the Mentor

controls.name: control_workflow_798950
controls.label: Book a Session
controls.invisibleCondition: (rowData.nextEvents && rowData.owner != fbUser.uid) || rowData.notifComplete == 'true' || rowData.$status$display == "Rejected" || rowData.state == "Session Went On" || rowData.$rejected$display == "true" || rowData.$status$display == "Rejected"

controls.name: control_custom_463553
controls.label: Message
controls.customCode: Session booking sent. You will be notified if the session has been accepted.
controls.invisibleCondition: !rowData.nextEvents || rowData.owner == fbUser.uid || rowData.$status$display == "Accepted" || rowData.state == "Session Went On" || rowData.$rejected$display == "true"
